pkmkdoc.description: Parallax Propeller Simple Integrated Development Environment SimpleIDE.

locale.resource:
{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\cocoartf1265\cocoasubrtf190 {\fonttbl\f0\fnil\fcharset0 LucidaGrande;} {\colortbl;\red255\green255\blue255;} \pard\tx560\tx1120\tx1680\tx2240\tx2800\tx3360\tx3920\tx4480\tx5040\tx5600\tx6160\tx6720\pardirnatural
\f0\fs26 \cf0 \ SimpleIDE is a complete development environment\ for the Parallax Propeller.\ \ This installs SimpleIDE (and all components) to\ Applications/SimpleIDE \ \ FTDI Chip USB Serial Driver installer will be saved to\ Applications/FtdiDrivers\ \ }

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\cocoartf1265\cocoasubrtf190 {\fonttbl\f0\fnil\fcharset0 LucidaGrande;} {\colortbl;\red255\green255\blue255;} \pard\tx560\tx1120\tx1680\tx2240\tx2800\tx3360\tx3920\tx4480\tx5040\tx5600\tx6160\tx6720\pardirnatural
\f0\fs26 \cf0 Install FTDI Chip USB Serial Drivers: \ \pard\tx560\tx1120\tx1680\tx2240\tx2800\tx3360\tx3920\tx4480\tx5040\tx5600\tx6160\tx6720\pardirnatural \cf0 \ ******* IMPORTANT *******\ \cf0 \ \pard\tx560\tx1120\tx1680\tx2240\tx2800\tx3360\tx3920\tx4480\tx5040\tx5600\tx6160\tx6720\pardirnatural FTDI Chip drivers must be installed for SimpleIDE\ to communicate with the Propeller Chip.\ \ OS-X Mavericks 10.9 or higher includes FTDI drivers.\ \cf0 FTDI drivers are provided \cf0 for users with older OSX versions.\ \ To install FTDI Chip drivers:\ \ 1) Use Finder to open Applications -> FtdiDrivers ->\ FTDIUSBSerialDriver_v2_2_18.dmg\ \ 2) Open FTDIUSBSerialDriver_10_4_10_5_10_6_10_7\ \ 3) Follow the FTDI Chip installer instructions.\ \ }
